channel.title: Comments on: Cool bit of software for the day

item.title: By: Bruce Elgort
item.dc:creator: Bruce Elgort
item.description: <p>Matt,<br /><br />I haven't tried Fetch however I love using Transit by Panic software. Transit allows you to script actions using Automator. I use this to produce and publish our podcast.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt,

I haven’t tried Fetch however I love using Transit by Panic software. Transit allows you to script actions using Automator. I use this to produce and publish our podcast.
